definitions.example: I learned to code on an early home computer in the 1980s.

definitions.definition: To add codes to a dataset.
To categorise by assigning identifiers from a schedule, for example CPT coding for medical insurance purposes.

definitions.example: We should code the messages we send out on Usenet.

definitions.definition: To call a hospital emergency code.
Of a patient, to suffer a sudden medical emergency (a code blue) such as cardiac arrest.
Encoded; written in code or cipher.
